items.metataghtml: <meta name="description" content="Walker Tape®’s Sure-Stick is the newest addition to our hard bond line.">
items.storedetaileddescription: Walker Tape®'s Sure-Stick hard bond is a maximum wear (3-5 weeks hold) adhesive, built with an optimzed lid to help extend the shelf-life of the adhesive. Designed to be extremely strong, Sure-Stick helps to stick even the hardest to-hold to clients and is reliable in tough conditions. You can trust Sure-Stick for a secure and flexible bond.
items.outofstockbehavior: Allow back orders with no out-of-stock message
items.featureddescription:
Storage

 

Keep the product away from heat, humidity, and light. Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F) or in the freezer. Bonds body tissue in seconds. Get medical attention for eye or internal contact.
items.storedescription:
Do not attempt to work with hard bond adhesives unless you are a professional.

 

Track Bonding - Directions

  1. Shave the hair around the top of the scalp, where the perimeter of the hair system will sit.
  2. Be sure there is at least 1/8" of hair stubble for the system to attach to.
  3. Using German Brown, apply the tape around the perimeter of the hair system where it will attach to the hard bond. This will protect the hair system.
  4. Apply a small amount of Sure-Stick adhesive to the hair stubble. It may be helpful to work in small sections because the glue dries very quickly.
  5. Press the hair system firmly in place. Hold for at least 10 seconds.
items.pagetitle: Sure-Stick - 1 fl oz, Squeeze Bottle | Walker Tape
